intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Where do you want to travel?
Where do you go to school?
What do you like to eat?
What is your favorite family outing?

respond_situations.description: You are in a shop. You see a shirt and ask about it.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to go to the park?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You need a pencil in class. Ask the teacher.
You want to buy a toy. Ask a friend for help.
You are at a café with a friend. You want to order food. ..

listening_script.text: I like taking photos. I use my phone. I take photos of my friends. We smile and have fun. I also take photos of nature.

monologue.topic: Talk about your favourite subject at school

follow_up_questions.question: Why do you like this subject?
When do you have this subject?
Who is your teacher for this subject?
